Html:
I wonder if there is anyone out there has this issue that I run into.  I am using WebService Studio 2.02.  I click the Get button to get my list of web service methods to call.  My list of web methods is very long but unfortunately this list does not appear in alphabetical order.  Since the list is long and not ordered in any particular way, it is very difficult for me to find the web method I want to invoke and test.  I have to scroll up and down for quite a while until I find it.

Is there a way to get the list ordered?  Is it the way I build my web methods causing the list not come out ordered?

I would appreciate your advice on this issue.

ï»¿

Hello,

I have downloaded the source and looked for the tree of the web methods and added the following line under the (this.treeMethods.ExpandAll();) in the fuction (private void FillInvokeTab())

this.treeMethods.Sort();

now I can see the methods sorted alphabatically.

regards,

MS
